alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Knox; Mahoning; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 8:57PM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Holmes, Stark, Mahoning and Knox counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong north to northeast winds will produce blowing and drifting snow which could significantly reduce visibilities and impact roadways, especially east-west oriented roadways. Low temperatures tonight will reach the mid to upper teens with wind chill values in the upper single digits.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
